**Исследуемая гипотеза:** Связь среднего уровня школьного образования с уровнем депрессии
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(grid)
library(corrplot)
library(plotly)
library(ggtext)
library(lme4)

df_base <- read_csv("data_general.csv")

df_base <- df_base %>% 
  select(c('location','year','sex','age','val','PISA_score','TIMSS_score'))
```

**PISA_score**
**Проверка выбросов по PISA тесту**
```{r}
df_boxplot_pisa <- df_base %>% 
  filter(year < '2016') %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, 
             y = PISA_score)) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = 'Проверка выбросов по PISA тесту') +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(df_boxplot_pisa)
```

**Проверка выбросов по показателю депрессии**
```{r}
df_boxplot_val <- df_base %>% 
  filter(year < '2016') %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, 
             y = val)) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = 'Проверка выбросов по показателю депрессии') +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(df_boxplot_val)
```

**Зависимость депрессии от уровня образования по годам**
```{r}
df_base$year <- as.character(df_base$year)

p1 <- df_base %>% 
  filter(year < '2016') %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = PISA_score, 
             y = val,
             color = year)) + 
  geom_point(size = 1) +
  labs(x = "PISA_score",
       y = "percent",
       title = 'Зависимость депрессии от уровня образования по годам') +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', alpha = 0.2) + 
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(p1)

df_base$year <- as.numeric(df_base$year)
```

**Зависимость депрессии от уровня образования по странам**
```{r}
p1 <- df_base %>% 
  filter(year < '2016') %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = PISA_score, 
             y = val,
             color = location)) + 
  geom_point(size = 0.5) +
  labs(x = "PISA_score",
       y = "percent",
       title = 'Зависимость депрессии от уровня образования по странам') +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', alpha = 0.2) + 
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(p1)
```

**Зависимость депрессии от уровня образования и возраста с учетом пола**
```{r}
p_2015 <- df_base %>% 
  filter(val < 0.35) %>% 
  filter(year == '2015') %>%  
  ggplot(aes(x = PISA_score, 
             y = val,
             color = sex)) + 
  geom_point(size = 2, alpha = 0.3, color = 'black') +
    ggtitle("2015 год") +
  labs(y = "percent") +
    geom_smooth(method = 'lm', alpha = 0.2) + 
  facet_grid(~age)+
  theme_minimal() + 
theme(plot.title = element_markdown(), legend.position = "none")

p_2015
```



**Корреляционный анализ данных**
```{r}
corrplot(cor(df_base %>% 
  na.omit() %>%
  filter(year == '2015') %>% 
    filter(val < 0.35) %>% 
  select(-c('year','TIMSS_score')) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = c('age'), values_from = val) %>% 
      select(is.integer | is.numeric)), method = "pie")

corrplot(cor(df_base %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  filter(year == '2015') %>% 
    filter(val < 0.35) %>% 
  select(-c('year','TIMSS_score')) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = c('sex'), values_from = val) %>%
```

**Все варианты по годам**

Fixed Intercept and Slope
```{r}
df_base_na <- df_base %>% 
  select(-c('TIMSS_score')) %>% 
  drop_na()

df_base_na$year <- as.character(df_base_na$year)

fit_simple <- lm(val ~ PISA_score, df_base_na)
summary(fit_simple)

ggplot(data = df_base_na, 
       mapping = aes(x = PISA_score, 
                     y = val)) +
  geom_point(na.rm = T, aes(col = year), alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", na.rm = T, col = "black", se = F) +
  labs(title = 'Fixed Intercept and Slope') +
  theme_minimal()

ggplot(data = df_base_na, 
       mapping = aes(x = PISA_score, 
                     y = val)) +
  geom_point(na.rm = T, alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", na.rm = T, col = "black", se = F) +
  facet_wrap(~year) +
  labs(title = 'Fixed Intercept and Slope') +
  theme_minimal()
```
***

Random Intercepts

```{r}
fit <- lmer(val ~ PISA_score + (1 | year), df_base_na)
summary(fit)

model_coefs_ri <- coef(fit)$year %>% 
  rename(Intercept = `(Intercept)`, Slope = PISA_score) %>% 
  rownames_to_column("year")

df_base_na_ri <- left_join(df_base_na, model_coefs_ri, by = "year")

ggplot(data = df_base_na_ri, 
       mapping = aes(x = PISA_score, 
                     y = val, 
                     colour = year)) +
  geom_point(na.rm = T, alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_abline(aes(intercept = Intercept, 
                  slope = Slope,
                  colour = year),
              size = 1.5) +
  labs(title = 'Random Intercepts') +
  theme_minimal()

model_coef_plot_1 <- ggplot(data = df_base_na_ri, 
       mapping = aes(x = PISA_score, 
                     y = val, 
                     colour = year)) +
  geom_point(na.rm = T, alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_abline(aes(intercept = Intercept, 
                  slope = Slope)) +
  facet_wrap(~year) +
  labs(title = 'Random Intercepts') +
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
df_base_na$predict <- predict(fit)

df_base_na %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(val, predict), names_to = "model", values_to = "value") %>%
  ggplot(aes(value, PISA_score)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line(aes(colour = model)) +
  facet_wrap(~year) +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal()
```

**Все варианты по странам**

Fixed Intercept and Slope
```{r}
df_base_na <- df_base %>% 
  select(-c('TIMSS_score')) %>% 
  drop_na() 

df_base_na$location <- as.character(df_base_na$location)

fit_simple <- lm(val ~ PISA_score, df_base_na)
summary(fit_simple)

ggplot(data = df_base_na, 
       mapping = aes(x = PISA_score, 
                     y = val),
       show.legend = FALSE) +
  geom_point(na.rm = T, aes(col = location), alpha = 0.5, show.legend = FALSE) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", na.rm = T, col = "black", se = F) +
  labs(title = 'Fixed Intercept and Slope') +
  theme_minimal()
```
